UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: A novel beta-defensin antimicrobial peptide in Atlantic cod with stimulatory effect on phagocytic activity.
Literature.Author: Ruangsri J, Kitani Y, Kiron V, Lokesh J, Brinchmann MF, Karlsen BO, Fernandes JM

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Micrococcus luteus ATCC 4698(IC50=125-250µg/ml),Planococcus citreus NCIMB 1493(IC50=2-4µg/ml),Aeromonas salmonicida NCIMB 1102(IC50=>250µg/ml),Vibrio anguillarum NCIMB 2133(IC50=>250µg/ml)
